sentences.sentence: I still wince when I think about that stupid thing I said.
sentences.translation: 我想到我说过的蠢话时仍懊悔不已。

sentences.sentence: He smiled-but it might as well have been a wince.
sentences.translation: 他笑了但也有些许退缩。

sentences.sentence: Those who wince at southern piety can always move north.
sentences.translation: 这些在南部虔诚氛围下退缩的人们仍然能够移向北方。
